Posts.Content: Nov 14, 2013 04:36PM - edited Nov 14, 2013 04:38PM by msmaples516 Thank you, I am 51 years old. My daughter is 21. I worry about her now. No one in my family hasÂ  breast cancer.Â  I am the first. I am just overwhelmed, shocked.Â  My Er came back positive, the progesterone came negative.Â  He said I am stage 1A grade 2 all margins were clear, clean, nothing in lymphnodes. Waiting for the HER2 test to come back and do the Octotype test.Â Â  He also said, non hormone treatment and no tomoxfin, something else. I have to wait and see for the test to come back. next apt is Dec 3rd day after my 52nd birthday!!

Some how I tell someone.Â  IF I didn't go have my routine mamo 9 months late.... I would NOT have known.Â  I am so sure I will be fine. What ever I have to do, I WILL.Â  My daughter is 22 and my son is 19. I will go to the doctor on Tuesday to get the results of my Octontype dx results.Â  He said I dont qualify for the Braca test. I may ask again just to be sure. Keep positive thoughts .Â  WE are all here for you.

Posts.Content: Jan 26, 2014 11:33AM - edited Jan 26, 2014 11:34AM by msmaples516 My dr gave me some Mia Derm its cream for radiation treatments you can only get it online.Â  I didn't because of the expense. I have been using Aquaphore. Its good. I lube the boob!! everyday two times a day, before I go to work and after the treatment when I get home.Â  I also have some silverdine the dr. gave me for my severe blister I have to deal with. Everyone is different. Just keep putting the aquaphore on I just bought the big jar in Walmart today it about 15 dollars.Â  Good luck, stay positive!!!Â  I wear sports bras that helps too. NO NYLON!!!Â Â  Mr Toms organic deodorant.  Ms. Maples.
